comments.body: What is this comment based upon? We've seen a lot of recordsets in the jenkins test projects that accumulate orphaned rrsets over time but even with multiple thousands, it shouldn't be enough to OOM the controller.

We never did a paged walk before? So we did not really aggregate multiple thousand records in this call before? I mean, multiple thousand should still not be a problem with the sizes of VMs we run our tests in. But millions might be a problem. And people might be using this in a pod/container whose memory limit is set to a small value.
If you are uncomfortable with this comment, I am fine removing it.
